20101220013554.222|20101220013555.333|CCO|>> Reporter: THE SERIES OF
20101220013555.333|20101220013556.444|CCO|RAINSTORMS IS BEING CAUSED
20101220013556.444|20101220013557.556|CCO|BY A LARGE PLUM OF
20101220013557.556|20101220013558.667|CCO|SUBTROPICAL MOISTURE
20101220013558.667|20101220013559.778|CCO|STRETCHING ALL THE WAY FROM
20101220013559.778|20101220013600.889|CCO|ASIA, MIXING WITH A LOW
20101220013600.889|20101220013602.000|CCO|PRESSURE SYSTEM THAT IS
20101220013602.000|20101220013603.111|CCO|SLAMMING IT INTO THE PAS
20101220013603.111|20101220013604.222|CCO|CIVIC COAST.
20101220013604.222|20101220013605.333|CCO|>> WE HAVE A LONG TRAIL OF
20101220013605.333|20101220013606.444|CCO|MOISTURE THAT EXTENDS WELL
20101220013606.444|20101220013607.556|CCO|OUT INTO THE CENTRAL PACIFIC

20101220013608.667|20101220013609.778|CCO|ARE SEEING RIGHT NOW.
20101220013609.778|20101220013610.889|CCO|UNTIL WE GET A CHANGE IN THE
